page.title: 02WHAPLODE DROVE-AMENITIES
page.content: The area is served by a general store/ post office,a very small general store and a mobile shop and butcher.There is also a fish and chip shop that opens on three evenings ,a bank sub-branch ,a small garage (servicing only)and a small British Leyland dealership offering a full range of garage services. Just outside the area are a church(Rev.Robinson) and the Elizabethan Social Centre,a fine facility that is still being developed by the villagers.There is a primary school (5-11)at Shepeau Stow after which the children transfer to Spalding or Crowland (11+ selection) Doctors and Dentist are at Crowland, hospitals - Spalding and Peterborough. There is one pub-The White Horse.Buses run once daily to Spalding and call once a week on the Spalding -Peterborough route.
